actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to afford the Secretary of the appropriate military department greater flexibility in programming space for inpatient and outpatient care in facilities of the uniformed services for areas having a large concentration of retired members of the uniformed services and their dependents.

summary.text: Removes restrictions on the Secretary of the appropriate military department in programming space for inpatient and outpatient care facilities of the uniformed services for areas having a large concentration of retired members. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1087)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to afford the Secretary of the appropriate military department greater flexibility in programming space for inpatient and outpatient care in facilities of the uniformed services for areas having a large concentration of retired members of the uniformed services and their dependents.
